ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Digest Number 76
ygData.msgSnippet: The Reason they do not read it is because Bug & Feedback are Broke. Plus if it does some how get through do you know where it comes to? The Guides & GM s which
ygData.messageBody:
The Reason they do not read it is because Bug & Feedback are Broke. Plus if
it does some how get through do you know where it comes to? The Guides &
GM's which means it never gets passed on to Verant at all. So that is why he
said that they never read them is because he never sees them.

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
41rst Ranked Druid of Karana
Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher

-----Original Message-----
From: David Harrell [mailto:pokes@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 09, 2000 8:19 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Digest Number 76


From: "David Harrell" <pokes@...>

> From: libertn2@...
>
> Don't waste your time with /bug. Post it on the everquest.com boards.
Abashi has recently said that they never read /feedeback so it can be safe
to assume that they also do not read /bug.

Where did he say this? I would be VERY interested to see it.

David
